description:
Mifune no Haha (lit. Mother of Mifune) is a street-vending fortune teller in the city of Mifune, the main setting of http://anidb.net/a4932 [Kara no Kyoukai]. She has the power of http://anidb.net/t2544 [precognition], also known as future sight. As fellow seers, Mifune no Haha and http://anidb.net/ch57875 [Kamekura Mitsuru] have known each other at least since the events of Kara no Kyoukai.
It is revealed in http://anidb.net/a9309 [Mirai Fukuin] that she became blind, losing not only her visual sight but also her future sight.
name: Mifune no Haha
